name: Reverie (itch) (parsonB)
description:
You are but a SHADOW of a man! As you age, the world ages with you. Acquire NEW abilities by collecting age-appropriate collectables! It’s a DANGEROUS world out there... good thing REINCARNATION exists! Take great leaps to FIND yourself!

A game made by DABUOYS. (2 Sigma Males)

NOTE: R Restarts the game. Forgot to take this out for the Jam Release. HOPE YOU DON'T FAT-FINGER IT!
